result.title: (271 A) Wrong answer in codeforces, but right on netbeans, devc++, and ideone
result.content:
Hi,

I got "Wrong answer on test 1" when i submit my code in case 271 A : Beautiful Years. But i got my answer right on dev c++, netbean, and ideone On test 1 : input = 1987 and output is 1793 in test case codeforces, but i got my answer right and it is 2013.

here is my code (i'm sorry if my code is bad because i am a noob ..) /* you can check my code here : http://ideone.com/7wO0ot */

#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>
int cekDistinctYear(char *year)
{
	int hasil = 1,i,j;
	char yearFunction[4];
	strcpy(yearFunction,year);
	char curr, swap;
	for(i=0;i<3;i++)
	{
		curr = yearFunction[0];
		for(j=1;j<4;j++)
		{
			if(curr==yearFunction[j])
			{
				hasil = 0;
			}
		}
		
		swap = yearFunction[0];
		yearFunction[0] = yearFunction[i+1];
		yearFunction[i+1]= swap;
	}	
	return hasil;
}

char *findDistinctyear(char *yearString)
{
	int i, yearInt;
	char *hasil = (char *)malloc(4);
	char *yearTest = (char *)malloc(4);
	sscanf(yearString,"%d",&yearInt);
	for(i=yearInt+1;i<9999;i++)
	{
		sprintf(yearTest,"%d", i);
		if(cekDistinctYear(yearTest)==1){
		  strcpy(hasil,yearTest);
		  break;
		}
	}
	return hasil;
}

int main() 
{
	char *input = (char *)malloc(4);
	scanf("%s",input);
	printf("%s",findDistinctyear(input));
	return 0;
}

Pls help me guys ..

Thank you for your attention :D
